description: Explore the intricacies of blockchain governance, including on-chain, off-chain, and hybrid models. Understand challenges such as scalability and power concentration, and discover real-world examples like Ethereum, Tezos, and Polkadot. Learn about the future integration of AI, cross-chain systems, and regulatory impacts on decentralized decision-making.
keywords: Blockchain governance, decentralized networks, on-chain governance, off-chain governance, hybrid governance, scalability, Ethereum, Tezos, Polkadot, artificial intelligence, cross-chain governance, decentralized decision-making
title: Exploring Blockchain Governance: Navigating Decentralization
